text: Niyo yaremye Amajuru n’Isi bimwe vy’ukuri, ikaba ariyo yapfuse Ijoro hejuru y’Umutaga kandi ikaba ariyo yapfuse Umutaga hejuru y’Ijoro kandi ikaba ariyo yagamburukije Izuba n’Ukwezi vyose bikagira gusa kugihe categekanijwe, mumenye yuko ariyo nyene ubushobozi kandi ariyo nyene ikigongwe cinshi
